newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HK bourse says processing 13 listing applications.
newsitem.headline: HK bourse says processing 13 listing applications.

text.p: The Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Ltd said it was processing a total of 13 cases applying for listings in Hong Kong as at the end of May.
All 13 companies have submitted advance booking forms for equity and debt securities (A1 forms) and furnished all required and necessary information, it said in a statement.
Another 13 companies have been approved by the listing committee of the exchange but have not yet listed, it said.
Another four companies have submitted A1 forms but their case were either inactive or on-hold, it added.
The exchange said it also received preliminary enquiries from 13 companies but their A1 forms were not yet submitted.
